thread.title: Kirsten Dunst Method-Acted Your Lifestyle
thread.title_full: Kirsten Dunst Method-Acted Your Lifestyle -- The Cut

author: Jessica Roy
title: Kirsten Dunst Method-Acted Your Lifestyle
text:
Kirsten Dunst.
In this season of the FX series Fargo , Kirsten Dunst takes on her most challenging role yet: a midwestern wife who is — wait for it — not Hollywood thin.
In order to accurately portray the character Peggy Blomquist, Dunst attempted to gain weight using the only tried-and-true method: eating a lot of pizza in bed.
"I just sat in my bed, watched Friday Night Lights and, like, ate," Dunst told Jimmy Kimmel during an appearance on his show Monday night. " I was in Calgary … it was cold, so I ordered in a lot of pizza … grilled cheese. I just had different cheeses and breads together."
One actress's "gaining weight for a role" is another woman's "typical Tuesday."
